name: The Black Demon
description:
A public domain adventure story, adapted from Francis Rolt-Wheeler's book A Toreador of Spain (1923) by Kip. Created for the "Gaming Like It's 1923" game jam.

When the black bull charged into the ring, a roar of applause went up from the ten thousand spectators gathered on the benches of the arena
This was the great toro bravo, the savage bull for whom they had been waiting.
